title: Many eyes watch
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a|hidetitle=a]]

[[div class="crom-thumbnail" style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block name=many-eyes.png]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

__During this incursion:__

@@ @@

Many eyes are always watching,
**Skeptical, cautious, aware**

My girlfriend begged me to be 'safe'
//Safe//

Comrades wished me to be 'safe'
//Safe//

Vultures ordered me to be 'safe'
//Safe//

Lawyers told me to be 'safe'
//Safe//

@@ @@

Each connotation different
Subtext changed, shifted slightly

**Alive**
**Unhurt**
**Obedient**
**Abiding**

@@ @@

Their eyes watch me
Even when out of sight
**Judging, worrying, waiting**

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

Ever present 
The feeling of being watched,

I asked myself to stay 'safe'
//Safe//

##black|Invisible##

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
